subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With his family’s blessing, Tom Glavine will finish off his probable Hall of Fame career as a Met. He agreed to a one-year contract with an option for 2008 worth $10.5 million on Friday.
snippet: With his family’s blessing, Tom Glavine will finish off his probable Hall of Fame career as a Met. He agreed to a one-year contract with an option for 2008 worth $10.5 million on Friday.
